Pre-Game Insights: India, led by Rohit Sharma, have not had the best of times in the series thus far.
Indian batting suffered collapses both times despite Rohit Sharma giving them flying starts.
On Sunday, India went 1-0 down in the series after losing by 32 runs.
Vandersay was the pick of the bowlers for Sri Lanka after he picked up six wickets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo will host the clash.
India are still looking for their 100th ODI win against Sri Lanka.
There will be a chance of rain on Wednesday from 2 PM onwards.
Temperatures will be around the 30-degree Celsius mark.
Others: Sri Lanka have been excellent thus far in the ODI series against a decent Indian team.
If their bowlers stay in form, there is no reason why they cannot win the third game.
Prediction: Sri Lanka to win the match.
